en-US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.free:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to giveaway free YNB to Lantern users. Grab Free Yinbi on 11/8 00:01 in Lantern!

What is Yinbi?
en-US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.fr: Yinbi (YNB) is a new unblockable cryptocurrency launching soon that allows for fast, reliable, easy to use, and low-cost mobile transactions. Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency!

zh.content.desktop.subheader: 加密货币隐币免费赠送
zh.content.desktop.body.main_screen.free:
蓝灯与隐币(YNB)合作，蓝灯用户将免费获赠隐币。11月19日0点1分在蓝灯内正式开抢隐币！

隐币是什么？
zh.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.fr:
蓝灯与隐币(YNB)合作，蓝灯用户将免费获赠隐币。11月19日0点1分在蓝灯内正式开抢隐币！

隐币(YNB)即将发布，是无封锁的加密货币。隐币无外汇限制，瞬时安全跨国转账，低手续费。蓝灯用户能在第一时间获得这种加密货币。

en-US.resellerLinkText: Purchase bulk pro accounts, get bulk Yinbi!
en-US.description:
Yinbi (YNB) launches soon, and Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency!

YNB will be distributed at the end of every day, based on the number of people that upgrade, and the number of years or accounts you purchase.

en_US.resellerLinkText: Purchase bulk pro accounts, get bulk Yinbi!
en_US.description:
Yinbi (YNB) launches soon, and Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency!

zh_CN.resellerLinkText: 批量购买专业版账号，批量获得隐币
zh_CN.description:
隐币(YNB)即将发布。蓝灯用户有机会抢先获得隐币加密货币。

蓝灯用户有机会抢先获得隐币加密货币。隐币会根据每天购买升级专业版的人数和时长赠送。
